dialogue.text: For a runt who always gets beat by a red-hat plumber every single time!
Hey! My dad says I'm getting better, and with enough practice, and new gadgets, I'll be able to finally defeat Mario!
But practice and all that gunk can only get you so far. When funny gizmos fail...
That's what these bad boys are for!
That's a coincidence, Bowser already has LOTS of Bullet Bill blasters.
Oh, these things don't fire Bullet Bills... One flick of this trigger... and POW!
With one of these friendly firearms, Mario will be as good as dead in a couple seconds flat!
Consider this basic training, if you live long enough to join us that is...
